subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The Phillies’ right-hander and two-time Cy Young winner, Roy Halladay, is likely to miss a significant part of the season after undergoing surgery to repair a bone spur in his right shoulder.
snippet: The Phillies’ right-hander and two-time Cy Young winner, Roy Halladay, is likely to miss a significant part of the season after undergoing surgery to repair a bone spur in his right shoulder.
